title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: First Voyage raises $2.5M for its AI companion helps you build habits
items.description: First Voyage has raised $2.5 million in a seed funding round from a16z speed run, SignalFire, True Global, and other investors.

items.title: Tesla starts testing robotaxis in Austin with no safety driver
items.description: It's one of the last big steps before the company can truly claim it's operating a robotaxi service, and start to take on Waymo.

items.title: WhatsApp’s biggest market is becoming its toughest test
items.description: Meta has three months to comply with Indian government directions that could affect how WhatsApp operates in the country.
